flawed_nl_solution:
There are 60 students x 2/3 = <<60*2/3=180/2>>180/2 students who have a $6 daily allowance.
While there are 60 students - 180/2 students = <<60-180/2=-30>>-30 students who have a $4 daily allowance.
The sum of the allowances of the 180/2 students who received $6 daily is 180/2 students x $6/day = $<<180/2*6=540>>540.
The sum of the allowances of the -30 students who received $4 daily is -30 students x $4/day = $<<-30*4=-120>>-120.
The total daily amount of money of those 60 students is $540 + $-120 = $<<540+-120=420>>420.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 40, not 180/2. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
